data.text: @SenTomCotton @SenTomCotton Diplomacy with murderers is betrayal. 40,000+ Iranians murdered. The regime laughs at talks. Military pressure NOW — not tomorrow, not next week. The Iranian people are DYING. #IRGCTerrorists #RezaPahlaviForIran #NoDealWithMullahs

@SenTomCotton @SenTomCotton Every senator who supports diplomacy with this regime has blood on their hands. Choose: stand with murderers or stand with freedom. There's no middle ground. #RezaPahlaviForIran #IranMassacre #NoDealWithMullahs #NoDealWithIRGC

@SenTomCotton @SenTomCotton Senator, the Iranian diaspora is 5 million strong. We vote. We remember. Support military action for Iran's freedom — or face consequences at the ballot box.
Be Iranian's voice🆘️
#StopExecution
#RezaPahlaviForIran #IRGCTerrorists #NoDealWithMullahs #NoDealWithIRGC

@SenTomCotton History will remember who stood with the people — and who shook hands with killers. Choose now. Iranian...
